mapper.sql: select id, box_open, user_id, box_id, is_exist, source_info, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from cnt_user_box
mapper.select: select cub.id, cu.nick_name nickname, cu.phone, cub.box_id boxid, cb.box_title boxtitle, cb.box_info boxinfo, cb.source_price sourceprice, cb.real_price realprice, cub.box_open boxopen, cub.source_info sourceinfo, cub.created_time createdTime, cub.updated_time updatedTime from cnt_user_box cub inner join cnt_user cu on cub.user_id = cu.user_id inner join cnt_box cb on cub.box_id = cb.id where cub.user_id=#{userid} order by cub.created_time desc
